name: ea-nodejs-typescript-template
description: TypeScript node.js project template. Integrated with ESLint, prettier, and husky.

scripts.CommentOn prepare: prepare is an npm lifecycle hook. Not supported by yarn 2+
scripts.CommentOn start: Quickly run code without type-checking. Type-checking is for the IDE or as an explicit command
scripts.CommentOn build: Runs type-checking and transpiles the entire project's typescript files into /dist/
scripts.CommentOn check-formatting: Check formatting with prettier. Only affects staged files.
scripts.CommentOn fix-formatting: Fix formatting with prettier. Your IDE should auto run this script on save.

author: Eyad Arafat
